com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class SceneGraphObject

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.scenegraph.SceneGraphObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Node, NodeComponent
public class SceneGraphObject
extends Object

The base class for all objects contained in a scene graph.

Field Detail

XITH3D_USERDATAKEY_OLDUSERDATA

public static final Object XITH3D_USERDATAKEY_OLDUSERDATA
This is the key used to store the user data from the setUserData(Object) method. Used to maintain Java3D compatability. Note that Object-type key is used to guarantee that conventional (old) user data namespace will never intersect with other user-defined namespaces.

Constructor Detail

SceneGraphObject

public SceneGraphObject()
Constructs a new SceneGraphObject.

Method Detail

isLive

public final boolean isLive()
Is the object live in a scene graph.

setLive

public void setLive(boolean live)
Sets the live state of the object

isCapable

public final boolean isCapable(int bit)
Determine if a given capability is turned on/off. Each object type defines its own set of capabilty bits as public static final int constants. These constants define the bit position (not value) for each capability. Therefore bit may not be ORed together.

setCapability

public final void setCapability(int bit)
Turn a given capability on. This may only be called when an object isn't live in a scene graph. If it is live when called a SceneGraphRuntimeException is thrown.

clearCapability

public final void clearCapability(int bit)
Turn a given capability off. This may only be called when an object isn't live in a scene graph. If it is live when called a SceneGraphRuntimeException is thrown.

public BitSet getCapBits()

public void setUserData(Object key,
                        Object value)
Set a meta-data value into the user data container.

Parameters:
key - The key to use to lookup the value.
value - The value associated with the key.

getUserData

public Object getUserData(Object key)
Get the Object associated with the given key.

Returns:
